text: "True Love" is a song written and recorded by American country music artist Vince Gill. It was released in March 1985 as the first single from the album The Things That Matter. The song reached No. 32 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1985) ! Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:1985 singles Category:1985 songs Category:Vince Gill songs Category:Songs written by Vince Gill Category:Song recordings produced by Emory Gordy Jr. Category:RCA Records singles
